channel.title: embeddings on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in embeddings on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog

item.title: Embeddings Use Cases
item.description: Introduction When I first heard of text embeddings, it sounds perplexed. I was handed a 800-page Nautual Language Processing textbook by my tech lead and I did not finish reading. Now, with open AI models and capabilities, it’s timing to learn and broadly leverage embeddings to achieve many tasks with easy access to embeddings. Let’s start exploring: Clustering Classification Anomaly detection Search Recommendations Goals Summarize key terminology, concept, and usage of text embeddings Write notebooks for comman tasks that can benefit from text embeddings Brainstorm use cases and ideas for improvements What do you need to know about embeddings?
